title: Beauty knows no pain
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Women
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Body image

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Feminine beauty (Aesthetics)
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Hysteria (Social psychology)
description: Illustrates behind the scenes story of how Kilgore College in Texas creates the nationally known drill team, The Rangerettes, which smiles its way through the half-time interval at college football games. Useful as a study of group dynamics, mass hysteria and the 1960s - 70s stereotyped view of the female image. Suitable for upper secondary level.
